flawed_nl_solution:
She will keep 1000000 / 2 = <<1000000/2=500000>>500000 Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive 500000 / 4 = <<500000/4=120500>>120500 tokens.
This means that Sandy will have 500000 - 120500 = <<500000-120500=379500>>379500 tokens more than any of her siblings.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 125000.0, not 120500.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
